Today we sign a bill direct election of Regional Councilors and the one that gives more powers and powers to the Regional Govt.
These reforms deepen democracy and decentralization. They mean more autonomy, more resources and more powers for the regions
The Regional Governments will have more autonomy and resources to design and implement their development plans and supervise the Mayor.
This is exciting! http://t.co/T0NM9sR

Thanks to everyone for your warm wishes. It's always a pleasure.
Today we deliver definitive homes in Villa Galvarino (Los Angeles) to 128 families who lost their homes due to the earthquake.
This year we will build 200 thousand housing solutions. 100 thousand for the families affected and the other 100 thousand for the regular plan.
We also signed a project that improves and streamlines the Law of Reconstruction and that incorporates many ideas of the great Felipe Cubillos.
